title: Content API for Shopping
description: Manages product items, inventory, and Merchant Center accounts for Google Shopping.

content_accounts_authinfo.title: Returns information about the authenticated user.
content_accounts_authinfo.description: Returns information about the authenticated user.

content_accounts_custombatch.title: Retrieves, inserts, updates, and deletes multiple Merchant Center (sub-)accounts in a single request.
content_accounts_custombatch.description: Retrieves, inserts, updates, and deletes multiple Merchant Center (sub-)accounts in a single request.

content_accountstatuses_custombatch.title: Retrieves multiple Merchant Center account statuses in a single request.
content_accountstatuses_custombatch.description: Retrieves multiple Merchant Center account statuses in a single request.

content_accounttax_custombatch.title: Retrieves and updates tax settings of multiple accounts in a single request.
content_accounttax_custombatch.description: Retrieves and updates tax settings of multiple accounts in a single request.

content_liasettings_custombatch.title: Retrieves and/or updates the LIA settings of multiple accounts in a single request.
content_liasettings_custombatch.description: Retrieves and/or updates the LIA settings of multiple accounts in a single request.

content_liasettings_listposdataproviders.title: Retrieves the list of POS data providers that have active settings for the all eiligible countries.
content_liasettings_listposdataproviders.description: Retrieves the list of POS data providers that have active settings for the all eiligible countries.

content_pos_custombatch.title: Batches multiple POS-related calls in a single request.
content_pos_custombatch.description: Batches multiple POS-related calls in a single request.

content_products_custombatch.title: Retrieves, inserts, and deletes multiple products in a single request.
content_products_custombatch.description: Retrieves, inserts, and deletes multiple products in a single request.

content_productstatuses_custombatch.title: Gets the statuses of multiple products in a single request.
content_productstatuses_custombatch.description: Gets the statuses of multiple products in a single request.

content_regionalinventory_custombatch.title: Updates regional inventory for multiple products or regions in a single request.
content_regionalinventory_custombatch.description: Updates regional inventory for multiple products or regions in a single request.

content_shippingsettings_custombatch.title: Retrieves and updates the shipping settings of multiple accounts in a single request.
content_shippingsettings_custombatch.description: Retrieves and updates the shipping settings of multiple accounts in a single request.

content_accounts_list.title: Lists the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.
content_accounts_list.description: Lists the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.

content_accounts_claimwebsite.title: Claims the website of a Merchant Center sub-account.
content_accounts_claimwebsite.description: Claims the website of a Merchant Center sub-account.

content_accounts_link.title: Performs an action on a link between a Merchant Center account and another account.
content_accounts_link.description: Performs an action on a link between a Merchant Center account and another account.

content_accountstatuses_list.title: Lists the statuses of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.
content_accountstatuses_list.description: Lists the statuses of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.

content_accountstatuses_get.title: Retrieves the status of a Merchant Center account. No itemLevelIssues are returned for multi-client accounts.
content_accountstatuses_get.description: Retrieves the status of a Merchant Center account. No itemLevelIssues are returned for multi-client accounts.

content_accounttax_list.title: Lists the tax settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.
content_accounttax_list.description: Lists the tax settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.

content_accounttax_get.title: Retrieves the tax settings of the account.
content_accounttax_get.description: Retrieves the tax settings of the account.

content_accounttax_update.title: Updates the tax settings of the account.
content_accounttax_update.description: Updates the tax settings of the account.

content_datafeeds_list.title: Lists the configurations for datafeeds in your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_list.description: Lists the configurations for datafeeds in your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeeds_insert.title: Registers a datafeed configuration with your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_insert.description: Registers a datafeed configuration with your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeeds_delete.title: Deletes a datafeed configuration from your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_delete.description: Deletes a datafeed configuration from your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeeds_get.title: Retrieves a datafeed configuration from your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_get.description: Retrieves a datafeed configuration from your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeeds_update.title: Updates a datafeed configuration of your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_update.description: Updates a datafeed configuration of your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeeds_fetchnow.title: Invokes a fetch for the datafeed in your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeeds_fetchnow.description: Invokes a fetch for the datafeed in your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeedstatuses_list.title: Lists the statuses of the datafeeds in your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeedstatuses_list.description: Lists the statuses of the datafeeds in your Merchant Center account.

content_datafeedstatuses_get.title: Retrieves the status of a datafeed from your Merchant Center account.
content_datafeedstatuses_get.description: Retrieves the status of a datafeed from your Merchant Center account.

content_liasettings_list.title: Lists the LIA settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.
content_liasettings_list.description: Lists the LIA settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.

content_liasettings_get.title: Retrieves the LIA settings of the account.
content_liasettings_get.description: Retrieves the LIA settings of the account.

content_liasettings_update.title: Updates the LIA settings of the account.
content_liasettings_update.description: Updates the LIA settings of the account.

content_liasettings_getaccessiblegmbacco.title: Retrieves the list of accessible Google My Business accounts.
content_liasettings_getaccessiblegmbacco.description: Retrieves the list of accessible Google My Business accounts.

content_liasettings_requestgmbaccess.title: Requests access to a specified Google My Business account.
content_liasettings_requestgmbaccess.description: Requests access to a specified Google My Business account.

content_liasettings_requestinventoryveri.title: Requests inventory validation for the specified country.
content_liasettings_requestinventoryveri.description: Requests inventory validation for the specified country.

content_liasettings_setinventoryverifica.title: Sets the inventory verification contract for the specified country.
content_liasettings_setinventoryverifica.description: Sets the inventory verification contract for the specified country.

content_liasettings_setposdataprovider.title: Sets the POS data provider for the specified country.
content_liasettings_setposdataprovider.description: Sets the POS data provider for the specified country.

content_orderinvoices_createchargeinvoic.title: Creates a charge invoice for a shipment group, and triggers a charge capture for non-facilitated payment orders.
content_orderinvoices_createchargeinvoic.description: Creates a charge invoice for a shipment group, and triggers a charge capture for non-facilitated payment orders.

content_orderinvoices_createrefundinvoic.title: Creates a refund invoice for one or more shipment groups, and triggers a refund for non-facilitated payment orders. This can only be used for line items that have previously been charged using createChargeInvoice. All amounts (except for the summary) are incremental with respect to the previous invoice.
content_orderinvoices_createrefundinvoic.description: Creates a refund invoice for one or more shipment groups, and triggers a refund for non-facilitated payment orders. This can only be used for line items that have previously been charged using createChargeInvoice. All amounts (except for the summary) are incremental with respect to the previous invoice.

content_orderreports_listdisbursements.title: Retrieves a report for disbursements from your Merchant Center account.
content_orderreports_listdisbursements.description: Retrieves a report for disbursements from your Merchant Center account.

content_orderreports_listtransactions.title: Retrieves a list of transactions for a disbursement from your Merchant Center account.
content_orderreports_listtransactions.description: Retrieves a list of transactions for a disbursement from your Merchant Center account.

content_orderreturns_list.title: Lists order returns in your Merchant Center account.
content_orderreturns_list.description: Lists order returns in your Merchant Center account.

content_orderreturns_get.title: Retrieves an order return from your Merchant Center account.
content_orderreturns_get.description: Retrieves an order return from your Merchant Center account.

content_orders_list.title: Lists the orders in your Merchant Center account.
content_orders_list.description: Lists the orders in your Merchant Center account.

content_orders_get.title: Retrieves an order from your Merchant Center account.
content_orders_get.description: Retrieves an order from your Merchant Center account.

content_orders_cancel.title: Cancels all line items in an order, making a full refund.
content_orders_cancel.description: Cancels all line items in an order, making a full refund.

content_orders_cancellineitem.title: Cancels a line item, making a full refund.
content_orders_cancellineitem.description: Cancels a line item, making a full refund.

content_orders_instorerefundlineitem.title: Notifies that item return and refund was handled directly by merchant outside of Google payments processing (e.g. cash refund done in store).
content_orders_instorerefundlineitem.description: Notifies that item return and refund was handled directly by merchant outside of Google payments processing (e.g. cash refund done in store).

content_orders_rejectreturnlineitem.title: Rejects return on an line item.
content_orders_rejectreturnlineitem.description: Rejects return on an line item.

content_orders_returnrefundlineitem.title: Returns and refunds a line item. Note that this method can only be called on fully shipped orders.
content_orders_returnrefundlineitem.description: Returns and refunds a line item. Note that this method can only be called on fully shipped orders.

content_orders_setlineitemmetadata.title: Sets (or overrides if it already exists) merchant provided annotations in the form of key-value pairs. A common use case would be to supply us with additional structured information about a line item that cannot be provided via other methods. Submitted key-value pairs can be retrieved as part of the orders resource.
content_orders_setlineitemmetadata.description: Sets (or overrides if it already exists) merchant provided annotations in the form of key-value pairs. A common use case would be to supply us with additional structured information about a line item that cannot be provided via other methods. Submitted key-value pairs can be retrieved as part of the orders resource.

content_orders_createtestreturn.title: Sandbox only. Creates a test return.
content_orders_createtestreturn.description: Sandbox only. Creates a test return.

content_orders_updatelineitemshippingdet.title: Updates ship by and delivery by dates for a line item.
content_orders_updatelineitemshippingdet.description: Updates ship by and delivery by dates for a line item.

content_orders_updatemerchantorderid.title: Updates the merchant order ID for a given order.
content_orders_updatemerchantorderid.description: Updates the merchant order ID for a given order.

content_orders_updateshipment.title: Updates a shipment's status, carrier, and/or tracking ID.
content_orders_updateshipment.description: Updates a shipment's status, carrier, and/or tracking ID.

content_orders_getbymerchantorderid.title: Retrieves an order using merchant order ID.
content_orders_getbymerchantorderid.description: Retrieves an order using merchant order ID.

content_pos_inventory.title: Submit inventory for the given merchant.
content_pos_inventory.description: Submit inventory for the given merchant.

content_pos_sale.title: Submit a sale event for the given merchant.
content_pos_sale.description: Submit a sale event for the given merchant.

content_pos_list.title: Lists the stores of the target merchant.
content_pos_list.description: Lists the stores of the target merchant.

content_pos_insert.title: Creates a store for the given merchant.
content_pos_insert.description: Creates a store for the given merchant.

content_pos_delete.title: Deletes a store for the given merchant.
content_pos_delete.description: Deletes a store for the given merchant.

content_pos_get.title: Retrieves information about the given store.
content_pos_get.description: Retrieves information about the given store.

content_products_list.title: Lists the products in your Merchant Center account.
content_products_list.description: Lists the products in your Merchant Center account.

content_products_insert.title: Uploads a product to your Merchant Center account. If an item with the same channel, contentLanguage, offerId, and targetCountry already exists, this method updates that entry.
content_products_insert.description: Uploads a product to your Merchant Center account. If an item with the same channel, contentLanguage, offerId, and targetCountry already exists, this method updates that entry.

content_products_delete.title: Deletes a product from your Merchant Center account.
content_products_delete.description: Deletes a product from your Merchant Center account.

content_products_get.title: Retrieves a product from your Merchant Center account.
content_products_get.description: Retrieves a product from your Merchant Center account.

content_regionalinventory_insert.title: Update the regional inventory of a product in your Merchant Center account. If a regional inventory with the same region ID already exists, this method updates that entry.
content_regionalinventory_insert.description: Update the regional inventory of a product in your Merchant Center account. If a regional inventory with the same region ID already exists, this method updates that entry.

content_productstatuses_list.title: Lists the statuses of the products in your Merchant Center account.
content_productstatuses_list.description: Lists the statuses of the products in your Merchant Center account.

content_productstatuses_get.title: Gets the status of a product from your Merchant Center account.
content_productstatuses_get.description: Gets the status of a product from your Merchant Center account.

content_shippingsettings_list.title: Lists the shipping settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.
content_shippingsettings_list.description: Lists the shipping settings of the sub-accounts in your Merchant Center account.

content_shippingsettings_get.title: Retrieves the shipping settings of the account.
content_shippingsettings_get.description: Retrieves the shipping settings of the account.

content_shippingsettings_update.title: Updates the shipping settings of the account.
content_shippingsettings_update.description: Updates the shipping settings of the account.

content_shippingsettings_getsupportedcar.title: Retrieves supported carriers and carrier services for an account.
content_shippingsettings_getsupportedcar.description: Retrieves supported carriers and carrier services for an account.

content_shippingsettings_getsupportedhol.title: Retrieves supported holidays for an account.
content_shippingsettings_getsupportedhol.description: Retrieves supported holidays for an account.

content_orders_createtestorder.title: Sandbox only. Creates a test order.
content_orders_createtestorder.description: Sandbox only. Creates a test order.

content_orders_advancetestorder.title: Sandbox only. Moves a test order from state "inProgress" to state "pendingShipment".
content_orders_advancetestorder.description: Sandbox only. Moves a test order from state "inProgress" to state "pendingShipment".

content_orders_canceltestorderbycustomer.title: Sandbox only. Cancels a test order for customer-initiated cancellation.
content_orders_canceltestorderbycustomer.description: Sandbox only. Cancels a test order for customer-initiated cancellation.

content_orders_gettestordertemplate.title: Sandbox only. Retrieves an order template that can be used to quickly create a new order in sandbox.
content_orders_gettestordertemplate.description: Sandbox only. Retrieves an order template that can be used to quickly create a new order in sandbox.
